titleStmt.title: A new way of conference being a dialogue, betweene Patrick Pastgrace a Papist, and Peter Pleadwell a Protestant. Fild with mirth, and varnisht with modesty. By Laurance Price.
titleStmt.author: L. P. (Laurence Price), fl. 1625-1680?

publicationStmt.publisher: printed and are to bee sold by Richard Burton, at the Horse-shooe, in Smithfield,

notesStmt.note: Title page = A2; text ends on A7v.
Copy has stained pages; closely trimmed at foot with slight loss of print.
Reproduction of the original in the Worcester College Library, Oxford University.
